entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Port Elgin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:42 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 9:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: NE 20 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h late in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
